channel.title: ::unjail
channel.description: i hade ::jail in my server but what i ty to ::unjail it dont work how do i add a ::unjail. Thank.

item.title: ::unjail
item.dc:creator: @R4nger_0wnz R4nger 0wnz
item.description:
@R4nger_0wnz wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been jailed by " + playerName);

yell(" “+playerName+” has jailed “+p.playerName+” ");
sM(“You have jailed “+p.playerName+”.”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to jail…”);
}
}
if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 3087; //add the x coord of your choice
		p.toY = 3503; //add the y coord of your choice
		p.action = 0; //action 1 = jailed action 2 = unjail
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);

yell(" “+playerName+” has unjailed “+p.playerName+” ");
sM(“You have unjailed “+p.playerName+”.”);
}[/code]

Is that right because im geting a error.

Read full topic

item.title: ::unjail
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2934; //Dunno where he'll end up
		p.toY = 3286; //Change these two coords
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);

yell(" “+playerName+” has unjailed “+p.playerName+” ");
sM(“You have unjailed “+p.playerName+”.”);[/code]

You’ll of course need stuff like teleblock = false; etc.
